title: Raw Keeler, Tenney Hindu, EPDG Seymour, and some Sweet Caps

posts.post_title: Raw Keeler, Tenney Hindu, EPDG Seymour, and some Sweet Caps
posts.post_content:
Shipping is $4 with tracking and insurance or $1 via PWE at your own risk and without tracking. Either way is fine with me, up to you.

Prices assume a no-fee payment method. Paypal Goods is fine, just add 3.5%. I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

Keeler GD/VG (perfect front, has a scrapbook line on the back) $425 SOLD
Seymour (has little spot of paper loss on back, almost perfect otherwise) $250
Tenney Hindu poor $385
